Address.value: 100 SOUTH SAUNDERS ROAD SUITE 300, LAKE FOREST, Illinois, 60045, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Assertio Holdings Inc is a pharmaceutical company. It is engaged in providing solutions to advance patient care in the areas of neurology, orphan and specialty medicines. The company markets three FDA-approved products for various neurological conditions including Gralise, tablets for the management of postherpetic neuralgia; CAMBIA, for acute treatment of migraine attacks with or without aura in adults 18 years of age or older; and Zipsor, liquid-filled capsules for relief of mild to moderate pain.
